response.explain: Since this is the first step, there is no previous error or code to explain. The task is to heat a burger and place it on a platter. The burger is currently inside the fridge and the platter is inside the top cabinet. The first step would be to open the fridge to access the burger.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the burger out of the fridge
(3) Heat the burger
(4) Open the top cabinet
(5) Take the platter out of the top cabinet
(6) Place the heated burger on the platter
